name: LEZORUB
description:
Is a captivating simulation and clicker game where players take on the persona of a proficient carpenter striving to survive in the wild. Their tasks include efficiently handling contracts, enhancing carpentry abilities, collecting valuable wood, and expanding their settlement by building new spaces and obtaining advanced tools. The overarching objective is to craft exquisite furniture pieces and thrive in this challenging setting.

Resource gathering involves collecting various types of wood, each with its own unique qualities and worth including oak, pine, mahogany, birch, and cedar. Different woods have different harvesting times, with more valuable ones taking longer to gather.
  • Players have the ability to craft furniture by utilizing various woods and crafting techniques to create personalized designs.
  • Base expansion includes the construction of additional buildings, which can be built using in-game currency. These buildings can include workshops, warehouses, and specialized facilities.

Features


  • The player must fulfill contracts with specific requirements, including wood type and furniture design.
  • Successful completion of contracts results in rewards, reputation, and experience points.
  • Seasonal or special event contracts provide exclusive rewards and furniture designs.
  • Carpentry skills are honed through points earned for completing contracts.
  • Skill upgrades unlock new furniture designs and base improvements.
  • Players can conduct research by investing money to unlock superior carpentry methods.
  • Advanced research yields permanent skill upgrades and bonuses.
